About Me

Hi, my name is Elise Minto and I'm a senior at the University of Michigan. I'm studying computer science in the College of Engineering and excited about the career opportunities ahead of me. Over the past few years I have gained exposure to the ways computer science is used in retail, finance, and general web development. Through all my observations, I have uncovered an interest in the overlap between healthcare and technology. I hope to use my knowledge to make healthcare products and technology more useful and accessible for all.
